settings.title: Delivery & Returns
settings.text:
• Free Shipping
    Shipping and taxes are included
  • 2-Year Warranty
    All Bee Cool bikes cover a 2-Year Warranty from the date of receiving the item.
  • 14 Days Returns
    Customers are responsible for return shipping costs.

48V 21Ah Battery

settings.bottom_title: Special Color Choices Make Your Life Colorful
settings.text2:
FulI suspension system, reliable brakes,
advanced lighting system
SHIMANO 7-speed transmission

settings.text1:
48V 21Ah large battery,
full suspension system,
hydraulic disc brakes and
more cool features.

settings.title: Motor
settings.right_text: The high-speed continuous 750W (peaking to 1100W) brushless geared hub motor with 80 Nm of max torque, which gives you a maximum power and be unstoppable on bad terrains. We’d love to let you feel the passion and enjoy the pleasure of cycling!

settings.title: Battery
settings.right_text: 48V 21Ah Lithium-ion battery gives you longer battery life. You are able to travel over 80 miles on a charge using pedal-assist mode and 50 miles on pure electric power mode. We want to make everyone enjoy the ride longer!

settings.title: Suspension
settings.right_text: Our ebikes equipped with a 1,200 pound spring weight, 180 mm travel rear suspension, manufactured by KSpeed. Our dual suspension system on both the front side and rear side helps you overcome the bumpiness on bad terrains. Your comfort is very important to us!

settings.title: Brakes
settings.right_text: Our ebikes are equipped with dual hydraulic disc brakes, which give you maximum stopping power. With hydraulic disc brakes, the actuation moves both pads towards the rotor at the same time and with even pressure. The most important advantage of hydraulic disc brakes is that they automatically self-adjust as they wear down.

settings.title: Light
settings.right_text: Front Light:The headlight is bright enough to let you see the road clearly in front of you when riding at nighttime. Integrated Tail Light:The integrated taillight combine with all these functions: Night Light (turned on with the front light at the same time),Brake Light,Turning Signal Light

settings.title: Shift System
settings.right_text: The SHIMANO 7 speed freewheel lets you shift to a larger cog for uphill riding and downshift to a smaller cog for high-speed cycling. During the pedal-assist mode, you can control the speed better with the gear shift system.

settings.title: Rack & Fenders
settings.right_text: With the rear rack installed, you'll be able to carry a bike bag or other gear on the back of your bike, making a bike-packing trip or just simple daily-use more convenient. The fenders are installed both front and rear and help keep your ebike and belongings clean during your ride.

settings.title: Intelligent Motor
settings.text: The high-speed continuous 750W (peaking to 1100W) brushless geared hub motor with 80 Nm of max torque, which gives you a maximum power and be unstoppable on bad terrains. We’d love to let you feel the passion and enjoy the pleasure of cycling!
settings.text_mobile: The high-speed continuous 750W (peaking to 1100W) brushless geared hub motor with 80 Nm of max torque, which gives you a maximum power and be unstoppable on bad terrains. We’d love to let you feel the passion and enjoy the pleasure of cycling!

settings.title: Hydraulic Brakes
settings.text: Our ebikes are equipped with dual hydraulic disc brakes, which give you maximum stopping power. With hydraulic disc brakes, the actuation moves both pads towards the 180mm rotor at the same time and with even pressure. The most important advantage of hydraulic disc brakes is that they automatically self-adjust as they wear down.

settings.title: Hydraulic Brakes
settings.text: Our ebikes are equipped with dual hydraulic disc brakes, which give you maximum stopping power. With hydraulic disc brakes, the actuation moves both pads towards the 180mm rotor at the same time and with even pressure. The most important advantage of hydraulic disc brakes is that they automatically self-adjust as they wear down.

settings.title: Four-Bar Linkage Suspension
settings.text: Bee Adventurer & Bee Explorer has a mature four-bar linkage suspension. BeeCool is the earliest all terrain e-bike four-bar linkage suspension maker in the US market and BeeCool has rich and advanced manufacturing technology in Four-Bar Linkage Suspension. The four-bar linkage stands for a four-sided polygonal frame structure: the chain stay, seat stay, rockers, and seat tube. This kind of structure can help the e-bike frame absorb both rear-upward force and vibrations.

settings.title: Four-Bar Linkage Rear Suspension
settings.text: BeeCool has a mature four-bar linkage rear suspension. We are the earliest four-bar linkage suspension all terrain e-bike maker in the US market and we have rich and advanced manufacturing technology in Four-Bar Linkage Suspension. The four-bar linkage stands for a four-sided polygonal frame structure: the chain stay, seat stay, rockers, and seat tube. This kind of structure can help the e-bike frame absorb rear-upward force and vibrations. The mature manufacturing technology allows us to offer Bee Riders better Four-Bar Linkage Suspension system with lower cost.

settings.title: Large Capacity Battery
settings.text:
48V 21Ah Lithium-ion battery gives you longer battery life.
You are able to travel over 80 miles on a charge using pedal-assist mode
and 50 miles on pure electric power mode.
We want to make everyone enjoy the ride longer!
settings.text_mobile:
48V 21Ah Lithium-ion battery gives you longer battery life.
You are able to travel over 80 miles on a charge using pedal-assist mode
and 50 miles on pure electric power mode.
We want to make everyone enjoy the ride longer!

settings.text: The K1188 26" x 4", 30 psi tires help the bike ride smoothly and safely even on bad terrains. The tires are made by Innova Tires, a reliable tire manufacturer from Taiwan.
The wider bike seat helps a lot with easing the pressure on your body, making bike rides more comfortable.

The battery lock keeps your battery safe. No one can remove your battery without the key. Most importantly, the lock keeps the battery locked up on the frame safely. The battery will never loose during the ride.

Fork Suspension Lock: Lock the front suspension helps you get more power for moving forward on a flatter road. Unlock the front suspension and the active suspension helps you smoothly overcome bumpy roads.

The cadence sensor pedal assist helps you ride easily.
On pedal assist mode, you can save more physical pedal on long-distance cycling.

The backlight LCD display shows you all the key information and status of the ebike, including operation modes, speed, pedal assist level, battery capacity, battery life, odometer, trip odometer, etc.

On the left side of the handlebar, you will find the switch of the turning signal light, the horn button, and the button pad (control the power on/off, mode switch, pedal assist level, front light, etc.)
The SHIMANO 7-speed gear shifter and the throttle are on the right side of the handlebar.

settings.cate_text: I bought this Beecool Explorer in late July and was delivered in August 12th after I called and switch the color to Red instead of Orange because it's a stock item. I had a minor issue with the code 02 after installation. The customer service advised that I needed to adjust the screw on the break lever of the one that affected which I did and it worked. I am very happy with the Red color and the performance of the Beecool Explorer. ——By Do V Nguyen

First time in the deep woods. Only game trails to follow we had to bump over a lot of logs I never would have on my MTB. We pedal the whole way but got stuck in a ravine I had to walk out and I just feathered the throttle a bit And you can walk anywhere since you don’t have to push the bike ever.——By Jim

Received the bike on time in perfect condition. This ebike is a game changer for me. I live in the mountains and bicycling had become too difficult. Now I can continue to get the pain free exercise I need with help when I need it. The Explorer was the right choice for me with my 28” inseam. It does everything I’d hoped it would do for me. I am excited to bicycle again! ——By Tim Tokarsky

Beautiful bikes I've ever had! The step-through height is just perfect for me. The fat tires and orange finish look very cool, and the bike is very steady and powerful. Wait about 1 month to get it, but it is worth it.——By Liz
Took a while to remove the rear rack. since I don't need it on the bike trail. Love the look without the rack and fenders. It's very beautiful! Thinking of buying a black one.——By Eli

settings.desc: Bee Explorer is a sporty, energetic and fashion all-terrain fat tire electric bikes. With the bright and beautiful colors, plus more streamlined design, Bee Explorer became more popular among fashion insiders. The Bike is equipped with a 48V 21Ah Lithium-ion Battery, which gives the bike a long travel distance over 80 miles per charge on pedal-assist mode and 50 miles on throttle power mode. The continuous 750W motor and 4’’ fat tires let the bike have maximum power to overcome any kinds of terrible terrains: soft sands, thick grass, heavy rain, slippery snow surface, steep rocks face. Our dual suspension system will bring you the max comfort.

settings.title: Where do we ship for free?
settings.text: We are currently able to ship the items to the 50 States and Washington D.C. in the U.S.We DO NOT ship to Puerto Rico, US Virgin Islands, Guam or other U.S. territories.We DO NOT ship to PO BOXES or APO.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my ebike?
settings.text:
Please refer to the shipping date on the product page. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to your email once the order has shipped. We will use FedEx Ground or UPS Ground to ship your bike orders. 
Accessories will be shipped by USPS or DHL.
Shipping within the 48 contiguous States in the U.S. is FREE.
Shipping to the State of Alaska and Hawaii will be charged $100 shipping fee.
Accessories shipments are Free. Once the items arrived in our warehouse, please allow 2-7 business days of delivery. For any third-party shipping, we are unable to provide any additional shipping information or documentation. In addition, the delivery dates provided by BeeCool Bikes are estimated which may change as sometimes act of God may occur.

settings.title: Will my ebike arrive assembled?
settings.text: Your bike will arrive 90% assembled. We will provide the tools and a comprehensive assembly video. You can assemble your ebike within 30 minutes. If you are unable to do the assembling work, you can also add a assembling services when you purchase the bike or book a mobile service at our service page. Our processional mechanics will goes to your door directly to do the assembling work.

settings.title: Are BeeCool ebikes able to be ridden in the rain?
settings.text: BeeCool ebikes are able to be ridden in light rain, the battery is water resistant but not waterproof. Other components can be damaged by water or exposure to heavy rain. It’s never a good idea to leave any e-bike outside in the rain.
